simulation.agent

Class SuccessCountingAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.agent.SuccessCountingAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, Listener, Speaker, WeightedLexiconAgent

    public class SuccessCountingAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightedLexiconAgent
    A class of agents described in "Evolutionary language competition - an agent-based model" paper. This type of agent preserves information about all its interactions in the form of counting successes and losses of interactions concerning words from a collection of languages. For more details about this kind of agent's behaviour, see the paper.
    See Also:
    Agent, WeightedLexiconAgent, WeightedLexicon, ELCPaperSimulationCreator

    • Constructor Detail

      • SuccessCountingAgent

        public SuccessCountingAgent(java.util.Collection<Language> languages,
                            WeightedLexicon initialLexicon,
                            double acquireWeight,
                            double weightChangingValue)
        Initializes this agent with the given collection of languages, initial lexicon, and acquireWeight and weightChangingValue parameters describing how this agent manages its lexicon. Languages from the given collection of languages are those of which successes and losses would be counted by this agent
        Parameters:
        languages - a collection of languages of which successes and losses will be counted by this agent
        initialLexicon - a lexicon to initialize this agent's lexicon
        acquireWeight - initial weight of new words in this agent's lexicon
        weightChangingValue - basic value by which weight changes in this agent's lexicon are made; note that it is always multiplied by a factor depending on this agent's counters of losses and successes; more details can be found in the paper

    • Method Detail

      • success

        public void success(Thing thing,
                    Word word)
        Increases weight of the given word in connection with the given thing and decreases weights of other words denoting this thing in this agent's lexicon. Updates counters of successes of the languages to which the given word belongs.
        Specified by:
        success in interface Listener
        Specified by:
        success in interface Speaker
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing which was a topic of the interaction
        word - a word which was communicated of the interaction

      • signal

        public Word signal(Thing thing)
        If this agent knows a word for the given thing, returns the dominating word denoting this thing in this agent's lexicon. If this agent does not know any word denoting the given thing, generates random word of this agent's dominating language, adds it to this agent's lexicon with acquireWeight and returns it.
        Specified by:
        signal in interface Speaker
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing for which a word should be communicated
        Returns:
        the dominating word denoting this thing in this agent's lexicon;
